summary: The dragon priest mask, Morokei, has the wrong enchantment assigned to it in vanilla Skyrim. This plugin properly assigns its true enchantment. Contains multiple versions with optional edits as well.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: Version 1.1 of this mod is the same as versions 1.0, except it now comes packaged as an installer for convenience of Nexus users. Installing the individual 1.0 mods still provides all the same benefits for those that either don\'t use the NMM or only want one version.

There was an enchantment within the master file specifically denoted for the Morokei mask, but it wasn\'t assigned. This plugin simply changes the mask\'s enchantment so that it uses the correct enchantment instead of a generic magicka regeneration.

The new enchantment increases magicka regeneration by 100% and also reduces the cooldown of dragon shouts by 20%. The cloth armor version removes Morokei\'s light armor status, for those casters out there. The No Helmet version is property of Vuradic, and removes the helmet from the character\'s head, allowing you to see their face while Morokei is equipped. None of these versions are compatible with other Morokei stat changes.

The download section contains certain compatibility edits for other Morokei mask mods as well. Credits for [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=562]No Helmet[/url] belong to vuradic.

Each download contains all the needed entries and are NOT compatible with one another. Only enable one version of this mod at a time. If you use the Nexus Mod Manager, downloading the FOMod version lets you enable and disable each mod via a custom installer.
________

INSTRUCTIONS

Simply download with the Nexus Mod Manager, or Download the .zip archive manually and extract the included .esp to Skyrim\'s data folder, usually located at \"Program Files\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\data\". Upon opening the game, choose \"Data Files\" and make sure MorokeiFix.esp is enabled.

If installing the FOMod version, the NMM will open a scripted installer that prompts users to pick one of the 4 mod versions. Manually installing the FOMod version is not recommended. Instead, manual installers should download individual versions.
________

VERSION HISTORY

1.1 FOMod - Adds no helmet and cloth armor combined fix.

1.0.1 FOMod - Fixes an error in 1.0 FOMod\'s No Helmet plugin.

1.0 FOMod - Custom installer for Nexus Mod Manager.

1.0c - Morokei cloth armor version for mages.

1.0n - No Helmet compatibility release.

1.0 - Correctly assigns Morokei\'s enchantment.

________

FAQ

Q: What UI mods are you using in the images?
A: I\'m using [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=667]QD Inventory[/url], with the [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=95]Morpheus font[/url].

________

OTHER BUG FIXES

The following are more bug fixes that help to clean up vanilla Skyrim. Contact me about exchanging links.

[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3077]Helmet Slot Stacking Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=2916]Keening Enchantment Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3473]Talos Shrine Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1946]Ebony Blade Fixed[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5669]Ebony Dagger Speed Fix[/url]
[url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4613]A Nightingale Blade Fix[/url]
author: ZeroTorrent
